subject: Guidance for Partial KYC Completion
description: Customer's KYC is partial. Enquiry created to guide them on completing the process. Informed that approval takes 30 days post-completion.

subject: KYC Partial
description: Customer has partial KYC. Enquiry created to check on completion.

subject: Guidance for Incomplete KYC
description: Customer has partial KYC and needs guidance on how to complete the remaining KYC process.

subject: Partial KYC - Aadhar Pending
description: Customer has partial KYC due to pending Aadhar document. Requires guidance to complete the process. Customer also expressed concerns about not receiving support for a long time.

subject: KYC Rejected - Document Submission Required
description: Customer's KYC has been rejected. Aadhar, PAN, Bank Details, and UPI documents are missing. Customer requires guidance on how to complete the KYC process.

subject: Account Blocked - Automatic Block
issue_description: Automatic block has exceeded 48 hours. Please investigate.

subject: Incorrect KYC Information Provided and Partial KYC Status
issue_description: Customer states that incorrect information was provided regarding required KYC documents (Aadhar/PAN and Bank/UPI). Customer had provided Aadhar, PAN, and Bank details, but system shows PAN and UPI as pending, leading to partial KYC. Customer was previously told only one of Aadhar/PAN and one of Bank/UPI was required. Complaint to investigate misleading information and expedite KYC completion.

subject: Partial KYC/No KYC-Contractor
description: Customer has Partial KYC. Needs to complete KYC details and wait for 30 days from completion. Enquiry for guidance.

subject: Partial KYC/No KYC-Contractor
description: Partial KYC; Aadhar details pending for contractor. Guidance enquiry created.

subject: Call Closure - General Inquiry
description: Customer had a general inquiry about translation. No further assistance needed.

subject: Partial KYC/No KYC-Contractor
description: Customer has partial KYC. Needs to complete Aadhar details and wait for 30 days post-completion.

subject: Call Closure - KYC Partial
description: Customer had partial KYC and an enquiry was created for guidance. No further assistance needed.

subject: Partial KYC/No KYC-Contractor
description: Partial KYC - Aadhar missing. Guidance enquiry created.
